statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE virtual_reality_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, email, account_created FROM user_profiles WHERE account_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT username, virtual_reality_level FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE virtual_reality_level > 3 ORDER BY account_created DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, virtual_reality_level FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND virtual_reality_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY virtual_reality_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE account_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND virtual_reality_level < 3 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT username, virtual_reality_level FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' OR email LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT full_name, email, profile_image_url FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT * FROM SocialConnections WHERE connection_type = 'FRIEND'
SELECT connection_id, connection_date FROM SocialConnections ORDER BY connection_date ASC
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.connection_type FROM UserProfiles u JOIN SocialConnections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id1 WHERE c.connection_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT u.username, u.profile_image_url FROM UserProfiles u JOIN SocialConnections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id1 WHERE c.connection_type = 'friend' ORDER BY u.username DESC
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, connection_date FROM SocialConnections ORDER BY connection_date DESC, user_id2 ASC
SELECT userID, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 18;
SELECT * FROM SocialConnections WHERE status = 'connected';
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityHub WHERE location LIKE '%valley%' ORDER BY hub_name ASC;
SELECT userID1, userID2, connection_date FROM SocialConnections WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE userID = 1;
SELECT userID, username, email, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialConnections WHERE status = 'connected' AND connection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT hub_name, location, user_capacity FROM VirtualRealityHub WHERE online_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY birthdate ASC;
SELECT u.username, f.status FROM UserProfiles u JOIN Friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE f.status = 'approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_connections FROM Connections WHERE user_id = 101 OR connected_to_user_id = 101;
SELECT message_id, sender_user_id, receiver_user_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE sent_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, birthdate FROM UserProfiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Friends WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT sender_user_id, receiver_user_id, message_text FROM Messages ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM UserConnections ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT u.username, u.email, p.post_content FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserPosts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT u.username AS author, COUNT(p.post_id) AS total_posts FROM UserProfiles u LEFT JOIN UserPosts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY author;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, c.comment_content FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserComments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.comment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT u.username, p.post_content, l.like_date FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserPosts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN UserLikes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id WHERE l.like_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
